promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic simple gorilla dark-type pokemon holding a white club. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or gorilla. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crysticlub, a a dynamic simple gorilla dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Gas Bond. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gorilla", "dark" or "Crysticlub". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, gorilla-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: This shadowy brute, Crysticlub, dwells in deep grottos. Its Gas Bond ability forms vaporous weapons, making it an ominous cave lurker.
